reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 28, 2020
reviews.text: I did read a review that described this book as an "American classic", if it is true then we all need to go back to school to learn how to write an essay again.Too many different little plots and subplots never finished nor explained , the players never fully fleshed out , the reasoning confusing , depressing in all descriptions , not uplifting nor mesmerizing. Just a big blob of uncooked ideas.  Just trying to explain my feelings , never said I WAS A WRITER, so I am sorry if I disappoint . At least I didn't take your money for some squalid little story  with a lot of built up  expectations. Just upset I passed the return deadline , It took me this long to bring myself to read to page 37... and I know this is childish but BLEAH
reviews.title: Badly written and convoluted
